title: From the earth to the moon
creator_credit: Michael Bostick, Ron Howard, Brian Grazer, Imagine Entertainment (US) and Clavius Base
brief_description: Produced with the cooperation of NASA, these are the stories of the men, women and children who lived and breathed the great American dream as it became reality through the voyages of the Apollo astronauts in their mission to place a man on the moon.
creator_credit_for_label: Michael Bostick, Ron Howard, Brian Grazer, Imagine Entertainment (US) and Clavius Base
